DialogueOption.Text: Hey Tephra. Have you.. heard anything about stuff that disappears sometimes?
I found where the purple rock in the museum goes when it hides, Tephra!
Where are the Nomai Ruins again?

Dialogue.Page: *GASP* You've noticed it too, astronaut?!
Where does it go, astronaut? Where does the purple rock in the museum go?!

DialogueOption.Text: Woah, woah! What purple rock?!
It travels to a dark cave somewhere on Timber Hearth.
It travels to a sanctuary made to protect Hearthians from a supernova.

Dialogue.Page: Aw.. I thought you were gonna tell me something about it, astronaut - not the other way around..
But yup, Galena and I both saw the purple rock in the museum disappearing sometimes!
And I don't mean when it jumps behind you and scares you.. I mean when it disappears completely from the museum!
Galena and I both looked all over Timber Hearth to find where the purple rock goes when it disappears.. But we've never found the purple rock's <color=orange>super secret hiding spot!</color>
I wonder where it's going when it disappears..
If you find out where the purple rock goes, promise you'll come back and tell us, astronaut!
Um.. It's somewhere on Timber Hearth, outside the village!
Oh! I think there's a picture of the <color=orange>Nomai Ruins</color> framed in the museum, astronaut. If you look at that, that should tell you what it looks like!
Woah, really?! Where does it go?

DialogueOption.Text: It travels to a dark cave somewhere on Timber Hearth.
It travels to a sanctuary made to protect Hearthians from a supernova.

Dialogue.Page: Woah.. How did you figure that out, astronaut? That's incredible!
But where is this spooky cave it's hiding in? Galena and I want to get in so we can use it for playing hide and seek!
We've looked all over Timber Hearth, even inside the zero-g cave.. But we've never seen the purple rock inside any of those caves..
Oh, I know!
There might be more caves around the <color=orange>Nomai Ruins</color> outside the village, astronaut! That's the one place we've never looked.

DialogueOption.Text: Why not?
Huh. Where are the Nomai Ruins again?

Dialogue.Page: We wanted to look there too - but Mayor Rutile told us not to ever go near there, because there's lots of dangerous ghost matter around there that we can't see.
So.. Could you look around the <color=orange>Nomai Ruins</color> for us, astronaut? The purple rock might be going to a cave there that we don't know about!
Oh, I think there's a picture of the <color=orange>Nomai Ruins</color> framed in the museum, astronaut. That should help if you have trouble finding it!
Good luck out there, astronaut!
Come back and tell us if you find anything there, alright?
Um.. It's somewhere on Timber Hearth, outside the village!
Oh! I think there's a picture of the <color=orange>Nomai Ruins</color> framed in the museum, astronaut. If you look at that, that should help you find it!
Good luck out there, astronaut!
Come back and tell us if you find anything there, alright?
Woah, really? The supernova is something the sun does, right? The exhibit in the museum taught me that!
Why would the Nomai build something like that? Is it just an emergency hiding spot in case that happens someday?
But if it is, why would they seal it up and hide it like that? There's no way to get in or out of there, heehee!
The Nomai are weeeird!

DialogueOption.Text: Hey Tephra. Have you.. heard anything about stuff that disappears sometimes?
I found where the weird rock goes when it hides, Tephra!
Where are the Nomai Ruins again?
Hey Tephra. Have you.. heard anything about stuff that disappears sometimes?
I found where the weird rock goes when it hides, Tephra!
Where are the Nomai Ruins again?
Hey Tephra. Have you.. heard anything about stuff that disappears sometimes?
I found where the weird rock goes when it hides, Tephra!
Where are the Nomai Ruins again?
Hey Tephra. Have you.. heard anything about stuff that disappears sometimes?
I found where the weird rock goes when it hides, Tephra!
Where are the Nomai Ruins again?
